channel.title: Tania Free and Open Source Farm Management System
channel.description: Recent content on Tania Free and Open Source Farm Management System

item.title: About
item.description: This project was initiated by Asep Bagja Priandana and Retno Ika Safitri. We are founders of Tanibox, an agriculture technology company in Indonesia. The main reason why Tania exist is to scratch our own itch when managing our small farm in our house. If we can solve our problem, so why not try to offer our solution to another farmer? We want to contribute more to the farmer communities around the world.
